Description:
Detects a non-browser process interacting with the Google API which could indicate the use of a covert C2 such as Google Sheet C2 (GC2-sheet)


Author: Gavin Knapp
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Non-Browser Network Communication With Google API
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((dst_host like '%drive.googleapis.com%' or dst_host like '%oauth2.googleapis.com%' or dst_host like '%sheets.googleapis.com%' or dst_host like '%www.googleapis.com%') and  not (process_path = '' or process_path = 'null') and  not ((process_path like '%:\program files\google\drive file stream\%' and process_path like '%\googledrivefs.exe') or process_path like '%\safari.exe' or process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe' or process_path like '%\brave.exe' or (process_path like '%:\program files\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe' or process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe') or (process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\internet explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path like '%:\program files\internet explorer\iexplore.exe') or process_path like '%\opera.exe' or process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe' or process_path like '%\maxthon.exe' or process_path like '%\whale.exe' or process_path like '%\googleupdate.exe' or process_path like '%\outlook.exe' or (process_path like '%:\program files\mozilla firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\mozilla firefox\firefox.exe') or (process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgewebview\application\%' and (process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%:\program files\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\windowsapps\microsoftedge.exe')) or ((process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgecore\%' or process_path like '%:\program files\microsoft\edgecore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe'))))
